name: uml
description: Generate UML diagrams (class hierarchy, class diagrams, sequence diagrams) from Python code
author: RETER Team

tools.name: get_class_hierarchy
tools.description: Generate class hierarchy diagram showing inheritance relationships (class names only, no methods/attributes)

tools.name: get_class_diagram
tools.description: Generate class diagram for specified classes showing attributes, methods, and relationships

tools.name: get_sequence_diagram
tools.description: Generate sequence diagram showing method calls between specified classes
